isConfigurationValid(Properties) - Method in class org.gservlet.DatabaseManager
Checks if the configuration is valid The required properties are :
db.driver : the jdbc driver class
db.url : the database url
db.user : the database user
db.password : the database user password
isNew() - Method in class org.gservlet.SessionWrapper
Returns true if the client does not yet know about the session or if the client chooses not to join the session.

Writes the specified message to a servlet log file, usually an event log.
log(Exception, String) - Method in class org.gservlet.ServletContextWrapper
Deprecated.
As of Java Servlet API 2.1, use ServletContextWrapper.log(String message, Throwable throwable) instead.

This method was originally defined to write an exception's stack trace and an explanatory error message to the servlet log file.

log(String, Throwable) - Method in class org.gservlet.ServletContextWrapper
Writes an explanatory message and a stack trace for a given Throwable exception to the servlet log file.

org.gservlet - package org.gservlet
Contains a number of classes and interfaces to create servlets, filters, listeners with the Groovy language.
org.gservlet.annotation - package org.gservlet.annotation
Contains a number of annotations that allow users to declare servlets, filters, listeners and to specify the metadata for the declared component.
